mapper.select: select vc_cd , vc_start_dt , vc_end_dt , vc_type , use_days , vc_reason , atch_file_id , create_id , fn_get_memnm(create_id) create_nm , create_dt , sign_id , fn_get_memnm(sign_id) as sign_nm , sign_dt , sign_state from vacation where vc_cd = #{vcCd} and del_yn = 'N'

select count(vc_cd) as cnt from vacation where sign_id = #{signId} and sign_state in ('D01', 'D03') and del_yn = 'N'
and create_dt >= to_date(#{startDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
and create_dt < to_date(#{endDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') + 1
order by create_dt

select count(vc_cd) as cnt from vacation where sign_id = #{signId} and sign_state not in ('D01', 'D03') and del_yn = 'N'
and sign_dt >= to_date(#{startDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
and sign_dt < to_date(#{endDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') + 1
order by create_dt desc
